name: FSU Dining Brawl
description:
Face off against an opponent in this 2-player only food fight game. Make sure to keep the holy burger in the air if it's on your side!

Controls (Note: this game was designed for an arcade cabinet with a specific key-mapping):

  • Quit Game: Escape
  • Start/Restart Game: 2
  • Select Difficulty: w/s or up/down
  • Move (Player 1):  a/d
  • Adjust Tray (Player 1): space/v
  • Move (Player 2): left/right
  • Adjust Tray (Player 2): 4/5

Credits:

  • Taryn Drolet - Programming & Design
  • Abigail Braman - Art & Design
